titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for suppressing insolent abuses committed by base people against persons of qualitie, aswell strangers as others, in the streetes of the citie and suburbes of London, with the parts adiacent
Proclamations. 1621-04-08
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster the eighth day of April, in the nineteenth yeere of our reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
